short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension built with React and TypeScript for summarizing YouTube videos on the go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TubeRecap is a Chrome/Browser Extension that can be used to summarize Long YouTube videos/podcasts. TubeRecap uses cutting-edge AI technology to analyze and distill the key points of lengthy videos and podcasts into summaries ranging from 50-150 lines, depending on the video's duration and content complexity. This powerful tool ensures you capture the core message and critical details without the need to watch the entire video.
